First ,big mistake making it free.
Second, is full not only of hackers, but also of Russians and Turks.
The Anti-Cheat system is made of dust, it does not ban anything, it lets you as overwatch to take attitude and all for nothing.
At the next Counter Strike game, Valve will not have that much to gain just like this one or previous, maybe just from the fools.
For me personally, I do not think I will play it for too long.
If you want to try it, you don't have to waste time, the game is nice, but it spoils you psychically and it doesn't deserve to get there.
Why wouldn't you download this, it's effin great

The base level of expected play is so cringe that you have to watch 25 hours of youtube grenade content to be effective. It's not exciting, its usually quiet camping. The convoluted economy system punishes players for not sitting on their hands.

PoS game was good until I have dealt with bugs which made it unplayable. Reinstalled recently and it still doesn't work. When I looked online to find out how to fix the bugs apparently the buy menu bug has been in the game since 2013 and I cannot move in game. Then when I go and verify game files its missing one file even though I just downloaded it. Now the game will start up but when I go into match it just shows the map loading screen but I can clearly hear the match going on around me. I bought this game and wish I didn't waste money on it especially with it being free to play now. guess that means only the microtransaction team is still working on this. Also guess this review means nothing if its free to play and there isnt any risk to using it other than not being able to alt f4 or ctrl alt del out of the screen and doing a hard reset. Thanks Valve.
